news.title: The NFL just wrapped a record-breaking season. Here’s why next year’s going to be even bigger
news.summary: The NFL announced that Paris, Melbourne and Rio de Janeiro will host regular-season games for the first time. In the days leading up to the Super Bowl, the NFL also announced that London will host a game.

news.title: Some European policymakers welcome U.S. Secretary of State Rubio's warm words, others remain cautious
news.summary: Rubio's comments struck a softer tone than Vice President JD Vance's at last year's event. Rubio's comments at the Munich Security Conference struck a tougher tone than Vance's last year.

news.title: Trump says he will issue executive order to get voter-ID requirements before midterms
news.summary: President Donald Trump says he will implement national voter-ID requirements by November's elections. President Donald Trump proclaims that he will find a way to implement national Voter ID requirements.

news.title: Global week ahead: Markets brace for more AI noise and 'scare trading'
news.summary: Looking back at last week's volatility could give some clues for the trading week ahead. Looking back at the volatility could gives some clues as to what to expect in the coming week.

news.title: What's next for Cuba? Trump turns the screws as the island runs out of jet fuel
news.summary: Cuba’s government appears to be on the brink of economic collapse amid a worsening energy crisis. The country has been suffering from an energy crisis since the start of the year.

news.title: My elderly mother has dementia. My sister sold her house and has hidden the proceeds. What can we do?
news.summary: “My sister is planning to move out of state and feels it is her right to control the money,” she said. “She feels she has a right to the money.”

news.title: ‘I’m a loner’: I’m 62 with a multimillion-dollar portfolio and no heirs. Should I find a wife for my twilight years?
news.summary: “I have never been married, have no siblings, and both my parents have passed away,” she said. “I’ve never been in a relationship. I’m always on the lookout for the perfect man.”

news.title: ‘I’m close to retiring’: I’m behind on my property tax. Is this a really bad time to sell my house?
news.summary: “I’ve never been late on a mortgage, so this makes me nervous,” she says. “I've never beenLate on a Mortgage, so This Makes me nervous”

news.title: ‘We’ve been dating for 5 years’: My boyfriend’s parents say he doesn’t earn enough to marry. Should I speak to his father?
news.summary: “Every year his very wealthy parents say that he needs to ‘earn more’ before he can marry me,” she said.

news.title: ‘We have no prenup’: I want rights of survivorship in our marital home. My wife prefers tenants in common. Now what?
news.summary: “She is an old-school farm girl who inherited all her money and wants to pass it down to her children,” her daughter says.
